Name: ROM Repair - what even?
Description: Another day, another inscrutable broken ROM function.
StartingComments:
Whatever it is it takes the form f(x, y, z) with x and y supplied by TOP and z supplied by BOTTOM.

f(0, 0, 45) = f(0, 0, 876) = f(0, 0, 0) = 0
f(0, 100, 50) = f(10, 90, 50) = 100; f(-10, 10, 900) = 10
f(-10, 10, -564) = -10
f(0, 1, 1) = f(0, 100, 1) = 2

Implement this as an infinite loop that does this continuously.
